column4: does anybody use a blackberry curve 8530 with linux? If so, how is it?
blackberries and linux don't go too well together. some use a program called Barry and others use a virtual machine to sync to the official blackberry tool in windows
okay, I'll try to stay away from the blackberry then. Thanks.
just googling around should bring up good info on what cell phones work with linux. the ubuntu forums have a lot of that
